Room.Name: Millwood Memorial Mayor's Office Foyer
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the main foyer of the Millwood Memorial Mayor's Office.
Room.LongDescription: The Mayor's Office is the seat of power for the city, or so the people who work there believe. Mayor Millwood was in fact a very powerful mage and therefore, when his time came, he did not feel like just giving up and dying. Although it cannot be proved that Millwood's experiment in the afterlife worked, many people do belive that the Mayor still haunts the office. The first successor to Millwood was mysteriously killed (thought to have committed suicide) by a letter opener through his temple. No one has since volunteered to be the next mayor. Somehow or another, though, things still get accomplished.
